EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Munich
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Munich. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Munich Wednesday, 13th July 2016 9:00am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/munich]]>
Location: Hilton Munich Airport Terminalstraße Mitte 20 85356 München Germany
Questions? Contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
